title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 400.3 - University grievance officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 400.3 - University grievance officer

State Regulations

The director of personnel services and employee benefits
shall be responsible for the administration of this grievance procedure, and is
hereby designated university grievance officer with full authority to act on
behalf of the chancellor of State University in making a determination on
matters presented pursuant to this grievance procedure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
400.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
